1.title: Arturo Torres' Stroke of the Brush
1.plot: Arturo Torres is our premiering "Day-Time Dreamer, Late-Night Hustler" feature. In this short film feature, we delve into an insightful look into Arturo's struggles, past, and growth as a influential Dallas TX artist. Arturo is one of the most enthusiastic and charming friend we have the pleasure to know, and to follow his journey as a painter, artist, and hustler and document it in our series is a true pleasure.

2.title: Cody Phillips' Devotion & Desires
2.plot: Cody Phillips is our "Day-Time Dreamer, Late-Night Hustler" feature in our continuing documentation of Dallas legends. In this short film feature, we visit Cody's story from his start up as a musician and transitional phase into a different form of artistic endeavors. Cody gives an insightful narrative in his own way of being inspired to balance his responsibilities as an artist and a great family man. Cody Phillips is a great leader and motivated hard worker who always strive to bring positive and productive change in the Dallas art communities. From schools, local ...

3.title: Sparks Ramirez' Destructive Minds
3.plot: Sparkz Ramirez is our "Day-Time Dreamer, Late-Night Hustler" feature in our continuing documentation of Dallas legends. In this short film feature, we visit Sparks' story as a rebellious youth reaching his greater potential as an artist, dancer, and creator through continuous growth and self-betterment. Spark Ramirez is a young up and coming artist in Dallas, TX, who is making a large splash in the dancing scene along with the art community with his vibrant and abstract artistic works. From graffiti, painting, and tattooing, Sparks is showing that it is truly possible...

4.title: Joonbug's Espresso Self
4.plot: Joonbug is the season finale of "Day-Time Dreamer, Late-Night Hustler" feature in our continuing documentation of Dallas legends. In this short film feature, we travel into the vibrant mind of Joonbug and his come up as an artist along with an insightful look into his own life's philosophies. Whether it's meeting strangers or creating experiences with people he has known for years, Joonbug is an extraordinary person always striving to leave an unforgettably mark to whoever he meets along his journey. Joonbug has been a great friend of ours since we've started Loyal ...

imdb.plot outline: This film series features several talented artists in a day-in-a-life of documentary of their come-up, inspirations, and struggles that all contribute to their growth as pioneering artists. The series was directed and shot by Thien Vuong to produce a series that positively influenced our community to push forward with their dreams, passions, and goals. We understand the fear that gets tied in doing what we love, but sometime seeing others on their way to their ultimate passionate endeavor can be a humbling way of revealing the reality of truly taking the leap of Faith into our dreams.
imdb.title: Day-Time Dreamers, Late-Night Hustlers
plot: This film series features several talented artists in a day-in-a-life of documentary of their come-up, inspirations, and struggles that all contribute to their growth as pioneering artists. The series was directed and shot by Thien Vuong to produce a series that positively influenced our community to push forward with their dreams, passions, and goals. We understand the fear that gets tied in doing what we love, but sometime seeing others on their way to their ultimate passionate endeavor can be a humbling way of revealing the reality of truly taking the leap of Faith into our dreams.::Thien Vuong
